  2. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says he was 'totally wrong' about antisemitism  Business Insider
  3. OpenAI's Altman says he was wrong to call antisemitism overblown  The Times of Israel
  4. 'So F*cked': Big Dem Donor Realizes He 'Was Totally Wrong' About The Left's Antisemitism  Daily Caller
  5. Sam Altman and Bill Ackman both think antisemitism is a left-wing problem  Business Insider
